blog.name: weirdandwackypokefusions
blog.title: Well that's strange!
blog.description:
Welcome!  I create, using the all-mighty classic Microsoft XP Paint, my own pokemon fusions. All the sprites come from pokestadium and usually people on deviantart/ the xy/sun&moon sprite project. I don't own any of the sprite used, I just fuse them! 
REQUESTS ARE OPEN! Ask Box: 3/15.
PLEASE FEEL FREE TO DRAW MY FUSIONS!!  I absolutely love it when people draw them! There's no need to ask either! Just make sure you tag me so them I can see it!
I hope you enjoy my fusions!

summary: Spirges Spiritomb and Florges fusion Ghost/Fairy Type Ability: Prankster Stats: HP - 65, Atk - 78, Def - 98, SpA - 118, SpD -...
caption:
Spirges

Spiritomb and Florges fusion

Ghost/Fairy Type

Ability: Prankster

Stats: HP - 65, Atk - 78, Def - 98, SpA - 118, SpD - 145, Spe - 60

The Cursed Bloom Pokemon

This pokefusion represents the flowers that have died in the past.  Any person who destroys a flower may see an odd stone by its side.  They must run before it is too late.

Request for anon.  I hope you like it.

summary: Please send pokemon fusions youd like me to draw
body:
Please send pokemon fusions youd like me to draw

Im with an extremely bad mood, i cant get myself to draw anything and pokemon always helps but it feels kinda weird to just draw pokemon on random poses and I love pokemon fusions

Pokemon retypes are also something i like to draw so yeah :“

blog.name: inikavulpixelreviews
blog.title: Let's Talk About Pokemon!
blog.description:
Reviewing my personal opinion on every single Pokemon! Yes, all 809 of them!
(Mostly) Daily Uploads, 3 PM EST.

summary: Let’s Talk About Pokemon - Darumaka and Darmanitan
title: Let’s Talk About Pokemon - Darumaka and Darmanitan
body:
554: Darumaka

We’ve got yet another fire monkey?! Aw c'mon guys, can you really–

Oh. Actually, as it turns out, this is the best of the bunch. Okay then, I’ll take it.

Darumaka here is just a precious little gremlin Pokemon. Even if little more than that, just look at that fat little body. And look at it dance! Darumaka just loves being alive, man!

Personal Score: 7.5/10

I may not got a ton to say about it but. Look at it! It speaks for itself!

555: Darmanitan

And thankfully, Darmanitan doesn’t completely do away with the Darumaka charm. It’s still got the wild-eyed look with a big, toothy smile. And it’s such a goofy looking thing, even if I don’t feel too strongly about it, it’s still got a lot of presence and personality to it. Heck, these two even seem to be rather indirect parallels to Mankey and Primeape. They’re both very simplified monkeys with little more to their body than a head plus arms and legs. But I feel like these two pull off the look infinitely better than ol’ Primeape does. And it even has a fun reason to look that way, other than that’s just the style they went for.

Another one of those things people at all familiar with Japanese culture would likely recognize, these two are based on the Daruma doll. And they’re perfect, simply as monkey-ified Darumas. But then comes n Darmanitan’s main gimmick.

Darmanitan also gets a hidden ability called Zen Mode, where it cools down when being knocked below 50% of its health. This turns it into a Fire/Psychic type, and its Attack stats pretty much swap places. Which is fun, if tragically infinitely less useful than its base ability, Sheer Force. Oh well.

Personal Score: 7.5/10

It may not be my cup of tea, but Darmanitan is cool anyways.

Overall:

Like I said, I tend not to like these monkey Pokemon. If nothing else, because I don’t find monkeys overly interesting animals. But Darmanitan is easily among the better ones.

[Archive]

[[MORE]]

blog.name: karla-chans-bjds
blog.title: Karla-chan's BJD Blog
blog.description:
Hello, my name is Karla-Chan welcome to my blog. I aim to be a Ball Jointed Doll (BJD) themed blog. However the key word there is aim, this is also my personal blog so other things sneak on here too (oops). I will be posting pictures of my dolls, my doll comics/photo-stories; as well as some of my BJD sewing and craft works. 

I am pro-artist and very much against recasts & want nothing to do with them or their owners. 

My dolls include:

Drisimi (RS Mei)
saoirse Sparklefury (RS An)
Ico (MNF Shushu)
Ki (MNF Chloe)
Ophelia (WD Priscilla)
Xyphos (MNF Karsh) 
Apple (WD Emma)
Myfi (MNF Soony)
Veps (DHS Chibi Feilene)
Pippin (NC Luna)
Toto (Evestudio Spider)
Aylin (MNF Lucywen)
Eun-Ji (AM Momonita)
